title: Meter reader/surveyor verification (property access)
dataVerified: Worker name, photo, employee ID, company, purpose of visit
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Worker status (active/verified). Real-time verification shows worker photo, employee ID, company affiliation, purpose of visit. Link to utility company, surveying firm, appraisal company, or government agency system
rationale: Property owner verifies meter reader, land surveyor, appraiser credentials before granting property access. Domain binding verifies utility company, surveying firm, appraisal company, or government agency. Prevents property access scams (fake surveyors casing properties for burglary).
